info.title: LocalBusinessDataBusinessReviews
info.description: Search for businesses reviews based on specified criteria.

get.description: Search for businesses reviews based on specified criteria.

review_datetime_utc.description: The date and time the review was posted, in UTC.

review_timestamp.description: The timestamp of the review (in seconds since the Unix epoch).

review_photos.description: An array of URLs of photos associated with the review.

like_count.description: The number of likes the review has received.

author_id.description: The ID of the author of the review.

author_link.description: The URL of the author's profile.

author_name.description: The name of the author of the review.

author_photo_url.description: The URL of the author's photo.

author_review_count.description: The number of reviews the author has written.

owner_response_datetime_utc.description: The date and time the owner responded to the review, in UTC.

owner_response_timestamp.description: The timestamp of the owner's response (in seconds since the Unix epoch).

owner_response_text.description: The text of the owner's response.

owner_response_language.description: The language of the owner's response.

author_reviews_link.description: The URL of the author's reviews.

author_local_guide_level.description: The local guide level of the author (1-10).

service_quality.description: The service quality of the review (e.g. 'excellent', 'good', 'average', 'poor', 'terrible').

review_form.description: The form of the review (e.g. 'full', 'short', 'suggest an edit').
